description: This tool guides users on how to check the version of Microsoft Edge installed on their systems. By navigating to the browser's interface and clicking on the three dots located in the upper right corner, users can access the 'Help and feedback' section. From there, selecting 'About Microsoft Edge' will display the current version information. Keeping the browser updated is crucial, particularly in light of vulnerabilities such as CVE-2023-6509. Refer to the update notes for potential security patches that address these issues. The tool is primarily used to ensure users have the latest security updates for a safe browsing experience.
